unnormalised: Arre yaar, linear algebra mhajea B.Techachea disanim khup dokheduk zalem! Mhaka matrux rupantorank lagun tras zatalo mhunn mhaka ugddas asa. Prof. Sharman amkam pustokantlean, Ch. 3 tulnantlean sumar 50 proxn sodovnk laile. Tem amkam 12/12/2022 meren axil'lea porixek zotayari korunk ditalem punn sot sangta, hanv fokot 40% gheun pass zalo. Mhaka taka chodd eigenvector ani eigenvalue borem somzunk favo aslem. Atam, te mhajea itihasantle dhund svopnnache bhaxen asat! Khan Academy vaprun hanvem te vixoi punn ek pavtti pollovnk zai; te borem sangtat mhunn aikunk melltta.
normalised: Arre yaar, linear algebra mhajea B-Tech disa bhitor ekdom dokachi dukhi asli! Mhaka matrix transformations khatir tras zatale te mhaka ugddas asa. Professor Sharma-n amkam textbookantlean sumar ponas prashna sodovnk layle, Chapter teen. Baravea December don hazar ani bayisacher asloli pariksha khatir to amkam toyar koruncho aslo punn sach sangta mhaka azun sumar chalish takke mellun pas zallem. Kash mhaka eigenvectors ani eigenvalues borem zannam aslem. Atam, te mhajea purvole jivnathle dhund dhund sopna bhaxen zallea! Khan Academy vaprun mhaka te concept konnachte zalear puni punha povalenk zai; aikta thoin borem sangtat mhunn.
text: Arre yaar, linear algebra mhajea B.Techachea disanim khup dokheduk zalem! Mhaka matrux rupantorank lagun tras zatalo mhunn mhaka ugddas asa. Mhaka taka chodd eigenvector ani eigenvalue borem somzunk favo aslem. Atam, te mhajea itihasantle dhund svopnnache bhaxen asat! Khan Academy vaprun hanvem te vixoi punn ek pavtti pollovnk zai; te borem sangtat mhunn aikunk melltta.
